1.0.name: wordpress/image-list-from-custom-fields
1.0.description: Image List From Custom Fields plugin displays a list of images from a recent number of posts and links back to them. This plugin is similar to other image list plugins with one main difference, instead of searching for and pulling an image from the post it pulls the image from the custom fields specified by the author when he/she writes the post. By doing this a much clearer image can be displayed with less load on the server. Insert the follwing code in the header (within the loop) or in the sidebar (with some css customization)
